entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the afternoon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
